org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot

Class SnapshotDiffInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.snapshot.SnapshotDiffInfo

  •  class SnapshotDiffInfo
extends Object
    A class describing the difference between snapshots of a snapshottable directory.

    • Field Detail

      • INODE_COMPARATOR

        public static final Comparator<INode> INODE_COMPARATOR
        Compare two inodes based on their full names

      • snapshotRoot

        private final INodeDirectory snapshotRoot
        The root directory of the snapshots

      • from

        private final Snapshot from
        The starting point of the difference

      • to

        private final Snapshot to
        The end point of the difference

      • diffMap

        private final SortedMap<INode,byte[][]> diffMap
        A map recording modified INodeFile and INodeDirectory and their relative path corresponding to the snapshot root. Sorted based on their names.

      • dirDiffMap

        private final Map<INodeDirectory,DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.ChildrenDiff> dirDiffMap
        A map capturing the detailed difference about file creation/deletion. Each key indicates a directory whose children have been changed between the two snapshots, while its associated value is a DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.ChildrenDiff storing the changes (creation/deletion) happened to the children (files).

      • renameMap

        private final Map<Long,SnapshotDiffInfo.RenameEntry> renameMap

      • isFromEarlier

        boolean isFromEarlier()
        Returns:
        True if from is earlier than to

      • generateReport

        public SnapshotDiffReport generateReport()
        Generate a SnapshotDiffReport based on detailed diff information.
        Returns:
        A SnapshotDiffReport describing the difference

      • generateReport

        private List<SnapshotDiffReport.DiffReportEntry> generateReport(DirectoryWithSnapshotFeature.ChildrenDiff dirDiff,
                                                      byte[][] parentPath,
                                                      boolean fromEarlier,
                                                      Map<Long,SnapshotDiffInfo.RenameEntry> renameMap)
        Interpret the ChildrenDiff and generate a list of SnapshotDiffReport.DiffReportEntry.
        Parameters:
        dirDiff - The ChildrenDiff.
        parentPath - The relative path of the parent.
        fromEarlier - True indicates diff=later-earlier, False indicates diff=earlier-later
        renameMap - A map containing information about rename operations.
        Returns:
        A list of SnapshotDiffReport.DiffReportEntry as the diff report.
